reviewText: I love this movie. Its good entertainment.  If you know your bible, you shouldn't be offended by this movie its only entertainment and its why I would make it part of my collection. I love the drama and is also funny.

THIS WAS AN EXCELLANT MOVIE!!!  I watch 4 times...and want to buy to add to my collection!  I just need it in England...If any one knows where I could find it...in English...please let me know!  EXCELLANT MOVIE!

I loved it. I usually stay away from these types of series since I am not religious, but I saw this on television and was immediately captivated. I even watched it with my parents who are religious and they really enjoyed it.
